abilities.name: Astartes Banner
abilities.rule: While this unit contains a Ravenwing Ancient, add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in this unit.

abilities.name: Honour or Death
abilities.rule: While this unit contains a Ravenwing Champion, add 1 to Advance and Charge rolls made for this unit and you can target this unit with the Heroic Intervention Stratagem for 0CP.

abilities.name: Narthecium
abilities.rule: While this unit contains a Ravenwing Apothecary, in your Command phase, you can return 1 destroyed model (excluding **CHARACTER** and **INVADER ATV** models) to this unit.
